name: Block Breaker (SorAxel)
description:
The classic game inspired by Breakout, where the player must break bricks by bouncing a ball with a paddle. It has an old school arcade style theme. The game has different power up and power downs with various levels.  My first projects made as part of my Computer Science Video Games Programming degree. I worked on it way after I finished school.

Music by: RoccoW

URL: freemusicarchive.org/music/RoccoW

CRT Shader by: Mattias 

URL: shadertoy.com/view/Ms23DR
